leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

tools.name: MetaflowX
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable and resource-efficient workflow for multi-strategy metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: MetaflowX is a comprehensive workflow designed for metagenomic analysis, integrating multiple strategies to handle large-scale sequencing data efficiently. It focuses on scalability and resource optimization for processing metagenome reads.

tools.name: assnake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake-based framework for NGS data analysis and management
tools.detailed_description: Assnake is a flexible and extensible framework built on Snakemake, designed to automate and manage Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data analysis pipelines, facilitating reproducibility and data organization.

tools.name: Clin-mNGS
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for pathogen detection from clinical metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: Clin-mNGS is a specialized bioinformatics pipeline tailored for the detection of pathogens in clinical metagenomic next-generation sequencing (mNGS) data, streamlining the process from raw reads to pathogen identification.

tools.name: chloroscan
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic workflow to recover chloroplast genomes
tools.detailed_description: Chloroscan is a bioinformatics workflow designed to identify and assemble chloroplast genomes from mixed metagenomic sequencing data, aiding in the study of plant or algal components in environmental samples.

tools.name: Arc Virtual Cell Atlas
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization and exploration tool for cell atlas data
tools.detailed_description: The Arc Virtual Cell Atlas provides a computational interface for exploring and visualizing cellular data, likely supporting single-cell or spatial omics analysis for biological research.

tools.name: Arcadia-Science/metagenomics
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for metagenomic QC, evaluation, and profiling
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains a Nextflow-based workflow developed by Arcadia Science for the comprehensive processing of metagenomic data, including quality control, assembly evaluation, and taxonomic profiling using both short and long reads.

tools.name: DEN-IM
tools.one_line_profile: Dengue virus genotyping pipeline for shotgun and targeted metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: DEN-IM is a Nextflow pipeline designed for the genotyping of Dengue virus from metagenomic sequencing data (both shotgun and targeted), facilitating viral surveillance and epidemiological studies.

tools.name: 16S-Metatranscriptomic-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: NextFlow pipelines for Qiime2 and Kraken2 based analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Nextflow pipelines integrating Qiime2 and Kraken2 for standardizing 16S rRNA gene amplicon and metatranscriptomic data analysis.

tools.name: AMBER
tools.one_line_profile: Assessment of Metagenome BinnERs
tools.detailed_description: AMBER is a standard evaluation tool for assessing the quality of metagenome binning methods. It calculates various metrics such as completeness, contamination, and purity by comparing bins against gold standard datasets.

tools.name: CAMISIM
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for metagenomes and microbial communities
tools.detailed_description: CAMISIM is a tool for simulating metagenomic data, allowing users to generate synthetic microbial communities with defined composition and complexity for benchmarking bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: CAMI II Evaluation
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization code for CAMI II challenges
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the scripts and tools used for the evaluation, analysis, and visualization of results from the second Critical Assessment of Metagenome Interpretation (CAMI) challenge.

tools.name: bettercallsal
tools.one_line_profile: Salmonella serotype assignment workflow using genome similarity
tools.detailed_description: BetterCallSal is a Nextflow workflow developed by the FDA/CFSAN to assign Salmonella serotypes based on genomic similarity using tools like MASH, SOURMASH, and KMA.

tools.name: sn-mg-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for basic metagenomic data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline designed for the standard processing of metagenomic sequencing data, likely including QC and assembly steps, for laboratory use.

tools.name: Jovian
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly automated pipeline for metagenomics and viromics
tools.detailed_description: Jovian is a pipeline designed to democratize metagenomics and viromics analysis, enabling wet-lab biologists to perform complex bioinformatic analyses with a focus on automation and audit trails.

tools.name: ebi-metagenomics-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: CWL description of the EBI Metagenomics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the Common Workflow Language (CWL) definitions for the EBI Metagenomics (MGnify) analysis pipeline, enabling portable execution of their standard analysis workflows.

tools.name: VIRify
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of phages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic assemblies
tools.detailed_description: VIRify is a pipeline for the identification and classification of bacteriophages and eukaryotic viruses within metagenomic and metatranscriptomic assembly data.

tools.name: MGnify Pipeline v5
tools.one_line_profile: CWL descriptions of the MGnify pipeline version 5.0
tools.detailed_description: This repository hosts the workflow definitions for version 5.0 of the MGnify pipeline, used by EBI for the analysis of microbiome data.

tools.name: snakemake-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Common Snakemake rules and workflows for metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of reusable Snakemake rules and workflows tailored for metagenomic data analysis, maintained by the EnvGen group.

tools.name: nanometa_live
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time species identification and pathogen characterization via nanopore sequencing
tools.detailed_description: Nanometa_live is a workflow and GUI designed for the real-time analysis of Nanopore sequencing data, enabling rapid species identification and pathogen characterization.

tools.name: MAG_Snakemake_wf
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for recovery of prokaryotic genomes from shotgun metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to recover Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) of prokaryotes from shotgun metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: plastiC
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for recovery of plastid genomes from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: plastiC is a specialized Snakemake workflow for identifying and recovering plastid genomes (e.g., chloroplasts) from metagenomic samples.

tools.name: mgnet
tools.one_line_profile: Data structures and workflows for metagenomic network analysis in R
tools.detailed_description: mgnet provides R-based data structures and tidy workflows specifically designed for conducting network analysis on metagenomic data.

tools.name: BAT.py
tools.one_line_profile: Automated tool for absolute and relative binding free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: BAT.py is a tool for automating binding free energy calculations (ABFE and RBFE) for protein-ligand systems, compatible with AMBER and OpenMM simulation engines.

tools.name: environmental_metagenomics
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for environmental metagenomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline provided by Genomics Aotearoa for processing environmental metagenomic data, serving as a starting point for researchers in the field.

tools.name: Geo-omics scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic pipeline and general scripts for lab analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and pipelines used by the Geo-omics lab for metagenomic data analysis and other general bioinformatics tasks.

tools.name: viGEN
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for viral RNA exploration in human NGS data
tools.detailed_description: viGEN is a pipeline designed to detect and explore viral RNA sequences within human Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) datasets, aiding in the study of viral infections.

tools.name: Wochenende
tools.one_line_profile: Whole genome/metagenome sequencing alignment pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for alignment and analysis of whole genome and metagenome sequencing data, facilitating pathogen detection and microbiome profiling.

tools.name: opal
tools.one_line_profile: SIMD C/C++ library for massive optimal sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance SIMD-accelerated C/C++ library for optimal sequence alignment, supporting local, global, and semi-global alignment modes.

tools.name: MetaSUB_CAP
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for short read metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A core analysis pipeline developed for the MetaSUB consortium to process short-read metagenomic data, including quality control, filtering, and taxonomic profiling.

tools.name: nbis-meta
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for metagenomic projects
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow for managing and analyzing metagenomic sequencing projects, automating steps from quality control to assembly and annotation.

tools.name: ViruSpy
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral identification from metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to identify and characterize viral sequences within complex metagenomic samples.

tools.name: MetaAll
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for detection of pathogens from metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: A three-step workflow designed for large-scale and reliable detection of pathogens from metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: metamorph
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomics and Metatranscriptomics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for the analysis of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data, facilitating multi-omics integration.

tools.name: metavirs
tools.one_line_profile: Viral Metagenomics Assembly and Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline specifically designed for the assembly and functional annotation of viral genomes from metagenomic data.

tools.name: nanite
tools.one_line_profile: Oxford Nanopore Viral Metagenomics Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined pipeline for processing and analyzing viral metagenomic data generated by Oxford Nanopore sequencing technologies.

tools.name: EasyNanoMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for nanopore long-read metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline designed for the analysis of metagenomic data from Nanopore long-read sequencing, including assembly and taxonomic classification.

tools.name: pb-metagenomics-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools and pipelines for PacBio HiFi metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and pipelines tailored for processing and analyzing PacBio HiFi reads in metagenomic studies.

tools.name: Let-it-bin
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for binning metagenomic short reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed to optimize the binning of metagenomic short reads from multiple samples into metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: MUFFIN
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and differential binning workflow
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for hybrid assembly and differential binning of metagenomic and transcriptomic data, enabling pathway analysis.

tools.name: Eukfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to retrieve microbial eukaryote genomes from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline designed to identify and retrieve microbial eukaryote genomes from complex metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: viromeqc
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to benchmark and quantify non-viral contamination in viromes
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for quality control of viral metagenomes (viromes), quantifying non-viral contamination by comparing against reference prokaryotic markers.

tools.name: mmlong2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for recovery and analysis of MAGs
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the recovery and analysis of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) from long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: mmlong2-lite
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight pipeline for microbial genome recovery
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight version of the mmlong2 pipeline, optimized for microbial genome recovery from metagenomic data.

tools.name: gmx_MMPBSA
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for end-state free energy calculations with GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A tool based on AMBER's MMPBSA.py for performing end-state free energy calculations using GROMACS trajectory files, useful in molecular dynamics and drug discovery.

tools.name: KOunt
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline calculating KEGG orthologue abundance
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline for calculating the abundance of KEGG orthologues in metagenomic sequence data, aiding in functional profiling.

tools.name: metaGT
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome and metatranscriptome joint assembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the joint assembly of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data to improve assembly quality and transcript recovery.

tools.name: QUAST
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly evaluation tool
tools.detailed_description: A quality assessment tool for genome assemblies, providing comprehensive metrics and reports to evaluate assembly continuity, correctness, and completeness.

tools.name: MAGqual
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to evaluate the quality of metagenomic bins
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to evaluate the quality of metagenomic bins (MAGs) and generate metadata compliant with MIMAG standards.

tools.name: SHAMAN
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny application for metagenomic analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: SHAMAN is a user-friendly Shiny application designed for the statistical analysis and visualization of metagenomic data. It provides a comprehensive workflow that includes normalization, differential abundance analysis using DESeq2, and various interactive visualizations such as PCoA, heatmaps, and volcano plots, making metagenomic insights accessible to non-programmers.

tools.name: YAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized Nextflow pipeline for metagenomic data processing
tools.detailed_description: YAMP (Yet Another Metagenomic Pipeline) is a reproducible and scalable workflow built with Nextflow and Singularity/Docker. It handles raw metagenomic reads processing including quality control, decontamination, and taxonomic classification, designed to run seamlessly on various computing infrastructures.

tools.name: amr-profiler
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for antibiotic resistance gene profiling
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow designed to characterize the presence and abundance of antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) in metagenomic datasets. It automates the process of mapping reads to ARG databases and quantifying resistance potential.

tools.name: metagen-fetch
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for automated retrieval and processing of public metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow specifically designed to streamline the downloading and initial processing of public metagenomic sequence datasets from repositories like SRA/ENA, facilitating large-scale meta-analyses.

tools.name: metamap
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for mapping and quantifying microbial genomes in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow that automates the mapping of metagenomic reads to a set of reference microbial genomes to quantify their abundance, useful for strain-level analysis and genome-resolved metagenomics.

tools.name: carrierseq
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence analysis workflow for low-input nanopore sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics workflow tailored for analyzing low-input Nanopore sequencing data, particularly useful for detecting target sequences in carrier sequencing experiments where signal-to-noise ratio is a challenge.

tools.name: nxf-kraken2
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Kraken2/Bracken taxonomic classification
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined Nextflow pipeline that encapsulates Kraken2 and Bracken within Docker containers to perform taxonomic classification and abundance estimation of metagenomic reads in a reproducible manner.

tools.name: CoMW
tools.one_line_profile: Comparative Metatranscriptomics Workflow
tools.detailed_description: A computational workflow designed for the comparative analysis of metatranscriptomic data, enabling researchers to study functional gene expression changes across different microbial communities.

tools.name: NanoSim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for Nanopore sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: NanoSim is a read simulator that captures the technology-specific features of Oxford Nanopore reads, including error profiles and read length distributions, to generate synthetic datasets for benchmarking bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: arete
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for bacterial genomics focusing on AMR and virulence factors
tools.detailed_description: Arete is a bioinformatics workflow designed for bacterial genomics, with a specific focus on identifying Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR) genes, Virulence Factors (VF), and Lateral Gene Transfer (LGT) events.

tools.name: bhattlab_workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of computational workflows for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various computational workflows developed by the Bhatt Lab for performing common metagenomics tasks, serving as a resource for standardized analysis protocols.

tools.name: kraken2_classification
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Kraken2-based metagenomic classification
tools.detailed_description: A specific Snakemake workflow implementation for running Kraken2 classification on metagenomic data, facilitating reproducible taxonomic profiling.

tools.name: ShortBRED
tools.one_line_profile: Marker-based profiling of protein families in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: ShortBRED (Short, Better Representative Extract Dataset) is a pipeline that identifies unique marker sequences for protein families and uses them to quantify the presence and abundance of these families in metagenomic datasets with high specificity.

tools.name: qadabra
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for differential abundance analysis in microbiome data
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to compare and rank differential abundance results from various methods in microbiome studies, helping researchers identify robustly differentially abundant taxa.

tools.name: brainrender
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for 3D visualization of neuroanatomical data
tools.detailed_description: Brainrender is a Python package that facilitates the creation of high-quality, interactive 3D visualizations of neuroanatomical data registered to reference atlases (like the Allen Brain Atlas), aiding in the interpretation of spatial neuroscience data.

tools.name: MetaWRAP
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for genome-resolved metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: MetaWRAP is a modular pipeline that integrates various metagenomic tools for quality control, assembly, binning, and bin refinement. It is particularly known for its bin refinement module which consolidates results from multiple binners to improve genome quality.

tools.name: SURPI+
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for pathogen identification from clinical metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: SURPI+ is a computational pipeline optimized for the rapid and comprehensive identification of pathogens (viruses, bacteria, fungi, parasites) from clinical metagenomic next-generation sequencing (mNGS) data.

tools.name: CheckM2
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning based quality assessment of metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: CheckM2 is a tool for assessing the quality (completeness and contamination) of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs). Unlike its predecessor CheckM which relies on lineage-specific marker sets, CheckM2 uses a machine learning model to predict genome quality, offering faster and more accurate assessments for novel lineages.

tools.name: CompareM2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for generating reports from microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to process microbial genomes and generate comprehensive reports, facilitating the comparison and analysis of genomic features across multiple samples.

tools.name: EsViritu
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral pathogen detection and measurement
tools.detailed_description: EsViritu is a read mapping pipeline specifically tailored for the detection and quantification of viral pathogens in metagenomic or clinical sequencing data.

tools.name: StaG-mwc
tools.one_line_profile: StaG Metagenomic Workflow Collaboration pipeline
tools.detailed_description: StaG (Stackebrandtia genomics) is a flexible and modular metagenomic workflow designed for processing and analyzing metagenomic data, developed as a collaborative effort to standardize analysis steps.

tools.name: dahak
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and containerization suite for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and workflows for benchmarking metagenomic analysis methods and containerizing bioinformatics tools, aimed at improving the analysis of complex non-clinical metagenomes.

tools.name: euryale
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic reads, built upon the MEDUSA framework.

tools.name: viroprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized bioinformatics pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive, containerized bioinformatics pipeline specifically designed for the analysis of viral metagenomic data, facilitating reproducible research.

tools.name: BacterialGenomeAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Snakemake pipeline for whole bacterial genome analysis
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline built with Snakemake for the analysis of whole bacterial genomes, streamlining the processing of genomic data.

tools.name: nvd
tools.one_line_profile: Opinionated viral metagenomics workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow designed for viral metagenomics analysis, providing an opinionated set of tools and steps for processing viral data.

tools.name: BALROG-MON
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Antimicrobial Resistance exploration in metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline dedicated to the exploration and identification of Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR) genes within metagenomic samples.

tools.name: asteroids_atlas_of_space
tools.one_line_profile: Code and data for mapping orbits of asteroids in the solar system
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Jupyter notebooks and scripts for processing astronomical data to visualize and map the orbits of asteroids in the solar system.

tools.name: metagenomics_workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for metagenomic sequence data processing and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python-based workflows designed for the processing and analysis of metagenomic sequence data.

tools.name: ymp
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible omics pipeline for metagenomics and other omics data
tools.detailed_description: A flexible pipeline framework designed for processing various omics data types, including metagenomics, facilitating reproducible analysis.

tools.name: pybullet_robots
tools.one_line_profile: Prototyping robots for PyBullet simulation environment
tools.detailed_description: A collection of robot models and environments for prototyping and simulation within the PyBullet physics engine, supporting robotics research.

tools.name: hAMRoaster
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking pipeline for AMR gene detection tools
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline designed to compare the output of various Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR) gene detection tools and provide performance metrics.

tools.name: atlas
tools.one_line_profile: Few-shot Learning with Retrieval Augmented Language Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Atlas model for few-shot learning using retrieval-augmented language models, supporting AI research in NLP.

tools.name: metagenomics
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for functional analysis of metagenomic WGS read data
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow designed for the functional analysis of Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) metagenomic read data.

tools.name: Pipeline-Holoruminant-Meta
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake metagenomic pipeline for read-based, contig-based, and MAG analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake pipeline for metagenomics covering read-based analysis, contig-based analysis, and MAG assembly and annotation.

tools.name: metaGEM
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating genome-scale metabolic models from metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: An easy-to-use workflow for generating context-specific genome-scale metabolic models and predicting metabolic interactions within microbial communities directly from metagenomic data.

tools.name: BugBuster
tools.one_line_profile: General metagenomics Nextflow pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose Nextflow pipeline designed for metagenomics analysis, facilitating standard processing steps.

tools.name: ARGprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for large-scale analysis of antimicrobial resistance genes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the large-scale analysis of antimicrobial resistance (AMR) genes and their flanking regions in metagenomic datasets.

tools.name: metagenomics_simulation
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts to generate and process simulated metagenomics reads
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to generate and process simulated metagenomics reads using MetaSim, aiding in method benchmarking and validation.

tools.name: TOFU-MAaPO
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for the analysis of metagenomic short reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline specifically designed for the analysis of metagenomic short read data.

tools.name: ommprotocol
tools.one_line_profile: Command line application to launch molecular dynamics simulations with OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool that facilitates the launching and management of molecular dynamics simulations using the OpenMM library.

tools.name: MAGFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for MAG quality assessment and taxonomical annotation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for the quality assessment and taxonomical annotation of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: moltemplate
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform tool for preparing molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A general cross-platform tool for preparing simulations of molecules and complex molecular assemblies, often used with LAMMPS.

tools.name: taxtriage
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow to identify and classify microbial organisms in metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed to agnostically identify and classify microbial organisms within short- or long-read metagenomic NGS data.

tools.name: FMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Mapping and Analysis Pipeline for metagenomics and metatranscriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the functional mapping and analysis of metagenomics and metatranscriptomics studies.

tools.name: SqueezeMeta
tools.one_line_profile: A complete pipeline for metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated pipeline for metagenomics/metatranscriptomics, covering assembly, binning, and annotation.

tools.name: mlm
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for processing metagenomics data and comparing tools
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for processing metagenomics data and comparing the impact of different bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: AMBER
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-free Multi-dimensional Benchmark for Multi-modal Hallucination Evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating multi-modal hallucinations in AI models without relying on Large Language Models (LLMs).

tools.name: Acanthophis
tools.one_line_profile: Plant metagenomics and variant calling pipeline using Snakemake
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and opinionated bioinformatics pipeline built with Snakemake, designed specifically for plant metagenomics analysis and variant calling tasks.

tools.name: Struo
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for building custom metagenome profiling databases
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to generate custom databases for metagenome profilers like Kraken2, Bracken, and HUMAnN, facilitating the inclusion of specific genomes into reference sets.

tools.name: Struo2
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable pipeline for creating and updating metagenome profiling databases
tools.detailed_description: The successor to Struo, offering a scalable workflow for creating and updating databases for metagenomic profiling tools such as GTDB-Tk and Kraken2.

tools.name: Atlas (MagicLeap)
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End 3D Scene Reconstruction from Posed Images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for 3D scene reconstruction that directly predicts a truncated signed distance function (TSDF) from a set of posed 2D images.

tools.name: metAMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Modular metagenomic assembly and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for metagenomic analysis that automates assembly, validation, and annotation, supporting multiple assemblers and providing quality metrics.

tools.name: PhyloMagnet
tools.one_line_profile: Gene-centric assembly and phylogenetic screening of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for screening metagenomic data for specific lineages using gene-centric assembly methods and phylogenetic placement.

tools.name: adrsm
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient DNA Read Simulator for Metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool designed to generate synthetic ancient DNA (aDNA) reads for metagenomic benchmarking, incorporating damage patterns typical of ancient samples.

tools.name: reads-for-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for metagenomic short reads from populations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to simulate metagenomic short reads from one or more populations, useful for benchmarking assembly and binning algorithms.

tools.name: metapop
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for macro- and micro-diversity analyses of metagenomic populations
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to analyze and visualize the macro- and micro-diversity of populations derived from metagenomic data.

tools.name: MeSS
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for simulating shotgun metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: MeSS (Metagenomic Simulation System) is a pipeline that automates the simulation of shotgun metagenomic samples for benchmarking purposes.

tools.name: zAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for amplicon-based metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible and scalable bioinformatic pipeline designed for the analysis of amplicon-based metagenomic data.

tools.name: Atlas (Metagenome)
tools.one_line_profile: Easy-to-use metagenomic data analysis framework
tools.detailed_description: ATLAS provides a simplified command-line interface to run complex metagenomic analysis workflows, handling QC, assembly, binning, and annotation.

tools.name: Metagenomics-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable workflow for short and long metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: A data-agnostic workflow automating the analysis of short (Illumina) and long (Nanopore) metagenomic reads, covering QC, assembly, and taxonomic classification.

tools.name: metaSNV
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic SNV calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for calling single nucleotide variants (SNVs) in metagenomic data, enabling population genetics analysis of microbial communities.

tools.name: plaSquid
tools.one_line_profile: Plasmid detection and classification pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the detection and classification of plasmids from metagenomic data.

tools.name: to-gff
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for GenBank/EMBL to GFF format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert GenBank (.gbk) or EMBL (.embl) files to GFF format, often required for compatibility with tools like QUAST.

tools.name: PathogenTrack
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogen identification from scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify and characterize pathogenic microorganisms within single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data.

tools.name: nf-core/ampliseq
tools.one_line_profile: Amplicon sequencing analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics analysis pipeline for amplicon sequencing data (e.g., 16S, ITS), utilizing DADA2 and QIIME2 for denoising and taxonomy assignment.

tools.name: nf-core/createtaxdb
tools.one_line_profile: Automated construction of metagenomic classifier databases
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the parallelized and automated construction of databases for various metagenomic classifiers, ensuring reproducibility in reference generation.

tools.name: nf-core/detaxizer
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for removing specific taxonomic sequences
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify and remove specific taxonomic sequences (e.g., host contamination) from raw genomic data.

tools.name: nf-core/eager
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient DNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fully reproducible pipeline for ancient DNA (aDNA) analysis, covering adapter clipping, mapping, damage calculation, and variant calling.

tools.name: nf-core/funcscan
tools.one_line_profile: Screening for functional and natural product genes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for screening metagenomic or genomic sequences for functional genes and biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) related to natural products.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and binning pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for the assembly, binning, and refinement of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) from shotgun sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/metatdenovo
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembly of metatranscriptomics/metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the de novo assembly and annotation of metatranscriptomic or metagenomic data, supporting prokaryotic, eukaryotic, and viral analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/proteinfamilies
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for protein family generation
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the generation and updating of protein families from sequence data.

tools.name: nf-core/readsimulator
tools.one_line_profile: Sequencing read simulation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to simulate various types of sequencing reads (Amplicon, Metagenome, WGS) to facilitate benchmarking and tool validation.

tools.name: nf-core/taxprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-taxonomic profiling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallelized pipeline for taxonomic profiling of shotgun metagenomic data (short and long reads) using multiple profiling tools simultaneously.

tools.name: nf-core/vipr
tools.one_line_profile: Viral assembly and variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the assembly and intrahost/low-frequency variant calling of viral samples from sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/viralmetagenome
tools.one_line_profile: Viral metagenome reconstruction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for untargeted whole genome reconstruction and iSNV detection from viral metagenomic samples.

tools.name: nf-core/viralrecon
tools.one_line_profile: Viral assembly and surveillance pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for viral surveillance, assembly, and variant calling, widely used during the COVID-19 pandemic for SARS-CoV-2 analysis.

tools.name: MGSIM
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome read simulation of synthetic communities
tools.detailed_description: A tool for simulating metagenomic reads from multiple synthetic communities, allowing for controlled benchmarking of metagenomic analysis tools.

tools.name: OpenFF Interchange
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular mechanics data interchange and conversion tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for storing, manipulating, and converting molecular mechanics data between different force field formats and simulation engines.

tools.name: OpenFF Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for molecular mechanics force field parameterization
tools.detailed_description: Provides implementations of the SMIRNOFF force field format and parameterization engines for small molecule drug discovery and molecular dynamics.

tools.name: openmmforcefields
tools.one_line_profile: Force field management for OpenMM simulations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit to manage and use CHARMM, AMBER, and other force fields within the OpenMM molecular dynamics simulation environment, including small molecule support.

tools.name: mikrokondo
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial genome assembly and QC pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed by PHAC for bacterial whole genome sequencing assembly and quality control, automating the process from reads to assembled contigs.

tools.name: mpox-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Monkeypox virus assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Nextflow pipeline for Monkeypox virus (MPXV) assembly, including host removal, reference-based assembly, and QC metrics generation.

tools.name: PEWO
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic Placement Evaluation Workflows
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking workflow to evaluate the accuracy and performance of different phylogenetic placement software and reference trees.

tools.name: hundo
tools.one_line_profile: Amplicon processing protocol for 16S and ITS
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow for processing 16S and ITS amplicon sequences, handling quality control, clustering, and taxonomy assignment.

tools.name: aviary
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and MAG recovery pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive metagenomics pipeline for hybrid assembly (long/short reads) and Metagenome-Assembled Genome (MAG) recovery.

tools.name: MetaViC
tools.one_line_profile: Viral metagenomic pipeline for unknown hosts
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for viral metagenomics to detect viruses in samples with unknown hosts or where the host genome is absent.

tools.name: MetScale
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable metagenome analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Snakemake workflows designed to scale metagenomic analyses, including quality control, assembly, and annotation.

tools.name: MIDAS
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated pipeline for estimating strain-level genomic variation from metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that estimates strain-level genomic variation from metagenomic data, enabling the profiling of strain heterogeneity and specific variants within complex microbial communities.

tools.name: MetaCHIP
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for identifying horizontal gene transfer (HGT) in metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify horizontal gene transfer (HGT) events within metagenomic communities, facilitating the study of gene flow among microbes.

tools.name: Sunbeam
tools.one_line_profile: Robust and extensible pipeline for metagenomic sequencing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A snakemake-based pipeline for analyzing metagenomic sequencing data, featuring steps for quality control, assembly, and classification, designed to be easily extended.

tools.name: us-atlas
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built TopoJSON geospatial datasets for the United States
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing pre-built TopoJSON files derived from U.S. Census Bureau data, used for geospatial visualization and analysis of U.S. cartography.

tools.name: world-atlas
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built TopoJSON geospatial datasets for the world
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing pre-built TopoJSON files derived from Natural Earth data, used for global geospatial visualization and analysis.

tools.name: TTClust
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for clustering molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python program to clusterize molecular dynamics trajectories from various formats (Amber, Gromacs, Charmm, etc.), aiding in the analysis of protein conformational states.

tools.name: LOMA
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for classification, alignment, and assembly of nanopore metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed by UKHSA for processing nanopore metagenomic data, including steps for taxonomic classification, alignment, and assembly.

tools.name: tracespipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for reconstruction and analysis of viral and host genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the reconstruction and analysis of viral and host genomes from metagenomic data, particularly at the multi-organ level.

tools.name: Metagenomic-Analysis-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenomic sequence data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for analyzing metagenomic sequence data, facilitating standard processing steps in microbial ecology studies.

tools.name: ARGs-OAP
tools.one_line_profile: Online analysis pipeline for antibiotic resistance genes detection
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the detection and quantification of antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) from metagenomic data using an integrated structured ARG database.

tools.name: DiTing
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to infer and compare biogeochemical pathways in metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to infer biogeochemical cycling pathways from metagenomic datasets and compare them across samples.

tools.name: GlobalBuildingAtlas
tools.one_line_profile: Global dataset of building polygons, heights, and 3D models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open dataset containing global building information, including polygons, height data, and LoD1 3D models, useful for urban science and spatial analysis.

tools.name: AMBER
tools.one_line_profile: Assessment of Metagenome BinnERs (AMBER)
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated assessment and benchmarking of metagenome binners, providing metrics to evaluate the quality of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).
